channel.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
channel.description:
I need to know... At frist I didn't understand what it was about, and now I know that Clients are for online parts of controlling the moparscape server. (server side I guess) But my question is this, how dose this work? I really don't understand. Can it be used offline? How can I get it to work offline (if it is able to be done) How do I do this?
If you say something like "read the tutorials" or "read the forums", I would like to know where the question I just asked would be at. Because I do not see them.
All reguards, and not trying to cause any trouble Dart Zamaki

item.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Download one from the RS2 Server Downloads section. Look for topics with ‘client’ in there name. Once downloaded extract it to your desktop/wherever you want to. Open it, click run.bat. When it loads up enter your server IP and log in. If there isn’t an option for you to input a IP adress, then change it in client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Alright. Thanks. Now I understand this. But now I would like to know this.
How do I get to it? I must not have it. (Or do I have to download it from a different file?)
And if so, where would I put it at? (folder wise)

Read full topic

item.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Sorry, i went offline. If you still need to know, a client is used to connect to other peoples servers/your own. Clients are customizable, you can add your own Graphics, items, sprites and sounds. (More stuff i can’t remember)
The clients you/other people make can be made unique and individual.
Thar you go?

Read full topic

item.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Alright, thank you man I shall ask more later (Got to go to class) sadly no computers there.
I’ll ask soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Quesion(s?) about Client
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

A client is what people use to connect to your server.

So instead of players using an online client like mopar or silab they can use your own client specifically for your server.

Plz say if u need to know more.

Brendan

Read full topic
